abstract: Citadel Investment Group‘s main hedge funds lost 53 percent for 2008, Dow Jones reported, citing a person familiar with Citadel’s preliminary estimates.
lead_paragraph: Citadel Investment Group‘s main hedge funds lost 53 percent for 2008, Dow Jones reported, citing a person familiar with Citadel’s preliminary estimates.

headline.main: Citadel’s Main Funds Fell 53% in 2008, Report Says
